user_query: I'm curious about the latest news from the finance industry in Indonesia. Retrieve news articles related to finance from detik on the Indonesia News API. Also, provide me with the keyword trends for 'finance' using the Targeted Keyword trend API.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the latest news articles related to finance from detik on the Indonesia News API.
Fetch keyword trends for 'finance' using the Targeted Keyword trend API.
